title: Problem 2135_B
statement: This is an interactive problem.The RiOI team is hosting a robot championship! This time, your robot is teleported into an infinite 2D plane with the Cartesian coordinate system on it. There are n anchor points on the plane, and the coordinates of the i-th anchor point are (x_i, y_i) (-10^9≤ x_i,y_i≤ 10^9).
